Hello,

The casing has unfortunately scratches at the bottom, just like the screen on the right side.

Dear Backcare,

Did the customer only intend to return one phone? Our logistics partner has only received one phone with the IMEI: 351436771149581.

Regards,

Dear ecomobile,

the customer confirmed the refund request for just one item. Please refund asap.
